About Me

BIO

Spiridon lives in sunny Florida where the air is always humid and hot, enjoying time spent with his wife and furry cat child. He is an avid consumer of Speculative fiction and still greatly enjoys playing 8-bit games in his spare time.

Constantly accumalating knowledge in the universe of Web Design and Development, I believe that the most important "stuff" is centered around the client. I have a great understanding of HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, and custom Wordpress development.

Please feel free to contact me at spyros.konofaos1@gmail.com if you would like to work with me.
